objectives.en: The course continues giving further basic knowledge and practising it in speech and writing with the aim of developing reading, conversational and listening skills.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on jätkata algtaseme keelestruktuuride ja suhtluskeele omandamist kõnes ja kirjas, arendades lugemis-, jutustamis-, vestlus- ja kuulamisoskust.

learning_outcomes.en: The student will have acquired the necessary vocabulary and grammar in a way that it covers all four language skills in what comes to coping within everyday life matters treated during the language course: students understands and are able to write texts on different subjects, are able to have a conversation or understand a spoken text.
learning_outcomes.et: Õppeaine läbinud üliõpilane on omandanud vajaliku sõnavara ja grammatika viisil, mis semestri käigus käsitletud igapäevaelu valdkondades võimaldab rakendada kõiki keelelise kompetentsi osaoskusi: mõista ja koostada erineva sisuga tekste, vestelda ning aru saada kuulatud tekstidest.

notes.en:
In unexpected circumstances, the course is delivered online for the entire study group. There are no hybrid classes planned.
Be sure to pay attention to the registration cancellation deadline stated in the course outline.
If you have concerns or special needs affecting your studies, please inform the lecturer at the beginning of the semester.
If necessary, contact the University of Tartu counseling centre: https://ut.ee/en/counselling-centre.
Requiring special conditions at the end of the semester is not acceptable.
notes.et:
Äärmisel vajadusel toimub kursus kogu keeleõpperühmale e-õppe vormis. Hajatunde ei tehta.
Pöörake kindlasti tähelepanu kursuse kirjelduses märgitud registreeringu tühistamise tähtajale!
Kui teil on õppetööd mõjutavaid muresid või erivajadusi, siis palume sellest õppejõudu informeerida kohe semestri alguses.
Vajadusel võtke ühendust Tartu Ülikooli nõustamiskeskusega: https://ut.ee/en/counselling-centre.
Semestri lõpus esitatud erinõudmised ei ole enam vastuvõetavad.

independent_work.en: Instructions from the teacher and/or on Moodle. If the homework is to be uploaded to Moodle or sent by e-mail, it should be saved/converted to *.doc, *.docx or *.rtf format.

grade_preconditions.en:
1) Active participation (at least 75% of classes, i.e. 20 times).
2) Positive results of the 3 summative tests (at least 60% correct answers in each test performed with closed materials). It is possible to retake each failed test once. Students are not allowed to re-sit a test for which they have received a positive result on order to attempt a higher result.
3) Positive results for verb conjugation tests in Moodle.
4) Mandatory home work properly presented on time.
5) Home reading (a reading assignment given by the teacher during the independent work week in April) evaluation "pass".

grade_evaluation.en: Continuous assessment is used in this course. The student will have positively finished the course after having actively participated in the classroom and/or online meetings (and worked with the proposed materials in case of individual e-learning), presented all their home work, taken all conjugation tests, passed all 3 summative tests and home reading evaluation. There will be no final test, the final grade will be calculated as the average result of 3 summative tests.

debt_elimination.en:
All requirements to pass the course must be met no later than on 29th May 2025.
Re-sits (with PRIOR NOTICE only) on the last week of the semester.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
